title: The Last of Us is Coming to HBO - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.05.20
description:
Blessing and Tim discuss a ton of PlayStation news including a new Ghost of Tsushima trailer and a Last of Us HBO series in the works.

Time Stamps -m
00:02:49 - Housekeeping
We’re hosting and producing a debut stream for the game CORE. On Thursday, March 19th at 3 p.m. PT, you can tune in to twitch.tv/kindafunnygames to see the devs from Manticore Games join Greg as they build multiplayer games live in CORE
The Roper Report   -
00:04:22 - Ghost of Tsushima has a new trailer and a release date
00:12:51 - “Is there any chance we'll see a hint of superpowers in this game?” - Fendyy
00:14:39 - The Last of Us' Series is in the Works at HBO
00:22:40 - Sony Names New Head of Santa Monica Studio
00:29:13 - The ESA has released an update to its statement about E3
00:32:07 - Microsoft asks employees to work from home
00:33:08 - “Do you think this is a smart move?” - Jamie S
00:35:17 - Out today
00:41:21 -  “Ad“ 
 Reader mail   -
00:41:51 - “When does Sony pull the trigger and add all first party games day and date to the service to match Xbox Game Pass?” - Ginger Crazy Kid
00:49:34 - “What do you think of Netflix Castlevania and what is your favorite film/TV series of a video game?” - Gondors Condor
00:54:42 - Squad Up: Thomas - PS4 - TheAquaChicken
00:55:39 - You‘re Wrong
00:59:17 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Imran
